statements: UPDATE MusicTherapyTechniques SET technique_description='Relaxing breathing exercises' WHERE technique_id=1;
UPDATE MusicTherapyTechniques SET therapeutic_goal='Improve mood and reduce stress' WHERE technique_name='Guided Imagery';
UPDATE MusicTherapyTechniques SET recommended_duration = '1 hour' WHERE technique_id = 1
UPDATE MusicTherapyTechniques SET technique_description = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.' , therapeutic_goal = 'Reduce stress and anxiety' WHERE technique_id = 2
UPDATE music_therapy_techniques SET technique_name = 'Relaxation Therapy', technique_description = 'A therapy focused on relaxing the mind and body' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE therapy_exercises SET exercise_description = 'Breathwork exercise to improve mindfulness' WHERE exercise_id = 3;
UPDATE music_therapy_techniques SET technique_description = 'New description' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE therapy_exercises SET exercise_description = 'Updated exercise description', exercise_name = 'New exercise name' WHERE exercise_id = 2;
UPDATE Therapy_Techniques SET description = 'Deep breathing exercises' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE Therapy_Exercises SET difficulty_level = 'Intermediate', duration = 30 WHERE exercise_id = 5;
UPDATE Therapy_Techniques SET technique_name='Cognitive Behavioral Therapy', description='A type of psychotherapy that focuses on changing negative thought patterns' WHERE technique_id=1;
UPDATE Therapy_Exercises SET duration=60, exercise_name='Yoga for Anxiety', difficulty_level='Intermediate' WHERE exercise_id=2;
UPDATE Techniques SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE Activities SET type = 'New Type', description = 'Updated description' WHERE activity_id = 3;
